Joan's chain to Olivia: Joan is Cheryl's ancestor → Cheryl is Joan's descendant → Barbara is Cheryl's descendant (so Joan←Cheryl←Barbara) → Vincent is Barbara's descendant (Joan←...←Barbara←Vincent) → Elijah is Vincent's descendant (Joan←...←Vincent←Elijah) → Karen is Elijah's descendant (Joan←...←Elijah←Karen) → Timothy is Karen's descendant (Joan←...←Karen←Timothy) → Bradley is Timothy's descendant (Joan←...←Timothy←Bradley) → Willie is Bradley's descendant (Joan←...←Bradley←Willie) → Richard is Willie's descendant (Joan←...←Willie←Richard) → Wayne is Richard's descendant (Joan←...←Richard←Wayne) → Roy is Wayne's descendant (Joan←...←Wayne←Roy) → Nicholas is Roy's descendant (Joan←...←Roy←Nicholas) → Daniel is Nicholas's descendant (Joan←...←Nicholas←Daniel) → Joseph is Daniel's descendant (Joan←...←Daniel←Joseph) → Donald is Joseph's descendant (Joan←...←Joseph←Donald) → Joe is Donald's descendant (Joan←...←Donald←Joe) → Harold is Joe's descendant (Joan←...←Joe←Harold) → Randy is Harold's descendant (Joan←...←Harold←Randy) → Beverly is Randy's descendant (Joan←...←Randy←Beverly) → Olivia is Beverly's descendant (Joan←...←Beverly←Olivia). So yes, Joan is ancestor of Olivia, so Olivia is descendant of Joan.

Therefore, Nicole and Joan both have Olivia as a descendant, so they share a common descendant. That's option 1.
